# Import Data

```{r}
dred <- read.csv("data/winequality-red.csv", sep = ";")
dwhite <- read.csv("data/winequality-white.csv" , sep = ";")
dnames <- read.csv("data/winequality.names", sep = "\t")
d <- rbind(dred, dwhite)

head(d)

# make ID column
d$ID <- 1:nrow(d)
# move ID column to front
d <- d[,c(ncol(d), 1:(ncol(d)-1))]

```
